Title: Hooves & Harlots
Plot: When Xena and Gabrielle encounter the Amazons, Gabrielle tries to save an Amazon and unwittingly finds herself an Amazon princess.
GuestStars: David Aston, Alison Bruce, Mark Ferguson, Rebekah Mercer, Colin Moy, Chris Bailey, Antony Starr, John Watson, Aurora Philips, Tanya Dignan, Andrew Kovacevich
